last_episode_to_air.name: It's just White Day. Plus more.
last_episode_to_air.overview: White Day is coming up, and Tadano wants to give something to Komi in return for the chocolate she gave him on Valentine's Day.

name: Komi Can't Communicate
original_name: 古見さんは、コミュ症です。
overview: At a high school full of unique characters, Tadano helps his shy and unsociable classmate Komi reach her goal of making friends with 100 people.

episodes.name: It's just, I wish I could speak.
episodes.overview: It's Tadano's first day of high school and all he wants to do is blend into the background. He starts to get to know Komi, a quiet girl in his class.

episodes.name: It's just a childhood friend. Plus more.
episodes.overview: To help Komi make more friends, Tadano tries to enlist the help of a talkative classmate who's friends with everyone, but they promptly turn him down.

episodes.name: It's just stage fright. Plus more.
episodes.overview: A nervous girl named Himiko Agari's anxiety levels go through the roof when Komi starts silently staring at her in a very intense way.

episodes.name: It's just a physical. Plus more.
episodes.overview: During the school health checkup, competitive classmate Yadano is determined to clock better results than Komi, whom she sees as her ultimate rival.

episodes.name: It's just my summer uniform. Plus more.
episodes.overview: Komi wonders why everyone starts staring at her when, like the rest of the student body, she switches from her winter to her summer school uniform.

episodes.name: It's just a joke. Plus more.
episodes.overview: When Tadano gets to school, he finds Komi waiting for him in the classroom. She then nervously hands him a letter.

episodes.name: It's just the pool. Plus more.
episodes.overview: Komi spends a lot of time getting ready for her trip to the local pool with Tadano and Najimi. Once they're there, they bump into even more friends.

episodes.name: It's just Obon. Plus more.
episodes.overview: It's the Obon holidays, and Komi is visiting her grandma's house. She can't help but feel a little awkward around her extended family.

episodes.name: It's just a country kid. Plus more.
episodes.overview: It's the first day of the new semester and everyone is happy to see Komi again, but then a student named Inaka starts to follow her around.

episodes.name: It's just sports day. Plus more.
episodes.overview: On the school sports day, Komi isn't sure how to properly cheer for her classmates, but she does her best. Then, it's her turn to run the relay race.

episodes.name: It's just a performance for the culture festival. Plus more.
episodes.overview: The students of class 1-1 have to decide what they're going to do for the culture festival — a task they're all taking way too seriously.

episodes.name: It's just the culture festival.
episodes.overview: At the culture festival, Najimi is up to something. They try to rope Komi and Tadano into their scheme.

episodes.name: It's just the arrival of winter. Plus more.
episodes.overview: On one cold morning, Komi wraps a scarf around her neck to keep warm, but as soon as she gets to school, Najimi plays a trick on her!

episodes.name: It's just a typhoon. Plus more.
episodes.overview: Komi gets all dressed and ready for school, but when she opens the front door, she's greeted by a typhoon. She decides to stay home and wait it out.

episodes.name: It's just a feeling. Plus more.
episodes.overview: Hoping to understand their classmate Komi more so they can be friends with her, Nakanaka and Yamai decide to talk to Tadano.

episodes.name: It's just a merry Christmas.
episodes.overview: It's Christmas Eve, and Komi has nothing planned. But then Najimi informs her that they're going to have a Christmas party — at Komi's house.

episodes.name: It's just a snowman. Plus more.
episodes.overview: Komi wakes up to find that it snowed overnight. With Tadano and Najimi, she goes out into the fresh snow to start building a snowman.

episodes.name: It's just everyone's New Years. Plus more.
episodes.overview: On January 2, Najimi calls up all their friends and hears about all the different ways they welcomed in the new year.

episodes.name: It's just a misunderstanding. Plus more.
episodes.overview: Komi decides to write a letter to Najimi to clear up a misunderstanding, but she might be too nervous to give it to them.

episodes.name: It's just the school field trip.
episodes.overview: Komi's class departs for their school trip. Her classmates Kato and Sasaki are determined to make it as enjoyable as possible for Komi.

episodes.name: It's just day 2 of the field trip.
episodes.overview: On the second day of their school trip, Komi joins Ayami Sasaki and Mikuni Kato on a meticulously planned trip all over the Kansai area.

episodes.name: It's just Valentine's Day.
episodes.overview: Nene Onemine invites Komi over to her house to bake a chocolate cake. Soon enough, Nene's rowdy younger siblings join in.

episodes.name: It's just ripped tights. Plus more.
episodes.overview: During class one day, Ren Yamai notices that Komi's tights have a hole in them. Luckily, Ren has a spare pair to lend her.

episodes.name: It's just White Day. Plus more.
episodes.overview: White Day is coming up, and Tadano wants to give something to Komi in return for the chocolate she gave him on Valentine's Day.
